item.title: OpenSSL - Generate Psuedo Random Passwords
item.description: This a snippet to generate a psuedo random password fast via the command line with OpenSSL. It generates a number of random bytes, which can either be output raw, as Base64 or as HEX. The Base64 output is a good password most of the time.
